member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModelHelpers
member.summary: Extensions methods for client model.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModelHelpers.ShouldBeFlattened(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.IParameter)
member.summary: Returns true if property has x-ms-client-flatten extension and its value is true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModelHelpers.WasFlattened(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.IParameter)
member.summary: Returns true if property was flattened via x-ms-client-flatten extension.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModelHelpers.GetClientName(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.IParameter)
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter client (explicitly defined code generation) name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Extensions
member.summary: Base code generator for Azure. Normalizes the ServiceClient according to Azure conventions and Swagger extensions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Extensions.NormalizeClientModel(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient,Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Settings)
member.summary: Normalizes client model using generic extensions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Extensions.FlattenModels(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient)
member.summary: Flattens the Resource Properties.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Extensions.RemoveUnreferencedTypes(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient,System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{System.String})
member.summary: Cleans all model types that are not used

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Extensions.FlattenMethodParameters(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient,Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Settings)
member.summary: Flattens the request payload if the number of properties of the payload is less than or equal to the PayloadFlatteningThreshold.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ParameterGroupExtensionHelper.AddParameterGroups(Microsoft.Rest.Generator.ClientModel.ServiceClient)
member.summary: Adds the parameter groups to operation parameters.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.HeadMethodInvalidResponses
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Head method '{0}' should contain only 200 level responses, or 404..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.InvalidExtensionProperty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value '{0}' provided for property '{1}' of extension '{2} is invalid. Valid values are: '{3}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.MissingProperties
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Azure resource {0} is missing required 'properties' property..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.ODataEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} needs to have a value..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.ODataFilterMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Method with {0} needs to have "$filter" parameter..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.ODataInvalidReferance
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} needs to have a valid definition reference..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Rest.Generator.Properties.Resources.ResourcePropertyMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Schema definition for Resource type with x-ms-azure-resource extension should have following properties: {0}.
